00052 #ifndef SOSSE_FS_H
00053 #define SOSSE_FS_H
00054 
00055 #include <types.h>
00056 #include <fstream.h>
00057 
00064 typedef struct s_fpath {
00065     iu16 df;    
00066     iu16 ef;    
00067 } S_FPATH;
00068 
00072 typedef struct s_finfo {
00073     iu16 size;  
00074     iu16 fid;       
00075     iu8 type;       
00076     iu8 ac[1];  
00077 } S_FINFO;
00078 
00080 #define FS_TYPE_DF  0x38
00082 #define FS_TYPE_EF  0x00
00083 
00085 #define FS_HEADER_SIZE  sizeof(S_FINFO)
00086 
00093 extern S_FPATH selected;
00094 
00103 bool fs_init( void );
00119 bool fs_seek( iu16 fid, S_FSTREAM *fs, S_FINFO *fi, iu8 type );
